nodes.text: The Chamber of the Dark Justice was a court room contained within Scardia Station, a cubical space station that served as a base of operations for the Church of the Dark Side in 5 ABY. The Chamber hosted the trials of individuals who were considered traitors to the Galactic Empire. The room was equipped with an ancient durese throne perched on a platform so that the judge—a diminutive Bimm agent posing as Supreme Prophet Kadann—would appear taller.
